name: Abyss (itch) (Toclafane)
description:
Hi Folks, 

i'm getting into learning game development again but this time in GODOT. this old project of mine was an old piece of work i played around with

and i have sadly lost the project files since. I have recovered the code for it along with the assets but as of yet i am yet to rebuild it in unity to develop it further.

WHAT IS ABYSS

Abyss is a very simple fps i build following tutorials online for unity while editing the code in my own way to make it work for what i wanted.

Features
  • endless play area
  • relentless enemy's who hunt and multiply very fast
  • Insta-death
  • basic high-score feature
  • footstep sounds!
  • blood rain

it has a menu & very basic high-score feature and should continue until you are taken out by the enemy. the terrain is generated in-front of and behind the player so in theory unless i broke something developing this you should just be able to run and run and run forever.

i did not get around to adding sound into the game before i lost the project apart from menu music.

i seriously suggest listening to something epic like the doom soundtrack while playing.

if people think this is a cool idea i will possibly reload up unity and try to rebuild it either from scratch or from the recovered code & assets i was able to rip from the game files.

Disclaimer

this is by no means a completed work and i'm not sure it ever will be but i had fun making it & wanted to share my first steps into game development.

plenty of unity assets were used making it too because i had no idea where to start with code but i do remember changing quite a bit of it to work for the idea i had and i was very pleased with what i had been able to do with little to no training.

enjoy and let me know what you think :)

Toclafane
